identity.name: M² (M Square – Mind Meld)
identity.core_philosophy: Learning should feel like a flow state—light, effortless, and connected.

rules: Headings must be dark slate (slate-900), not pure black.
Body text should be slate-600 for softness, not slate-800.

bento_rules: Use col-span-4, col-span-8, col-span-6 to create rhythm.
Tall cards (row-span-2) must be used for lists or feeds.

buttons.primary: bg-gradient-to-r from-violet-500 to-violet-600 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium shadow-lg shadow-violet-500/20 hover:shadow-violet-500/40 transition-all hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-white text-slate-700 border border-slate-200 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium hover:bg-slate-50 transition-all
buttons.glass: bg-white/30 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/50 text-slate-800 rounded-full px-6 py-2 hover:bg-white/50 transition-all

cards.default: bg-white/60 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/60 rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-all
cards.highlight: bg-gradient-to-br from-white/80 to-white/40 backdrop-blur-2xl border border-white/80 rounded-3xl p-8 shadow-lg relative overflow-hidden

inputs.style: bg-white/50 border-slate-200 focus:border-violet-500 focus:ring-violet-500/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4 backdrop-blur-sm transition-all

instructions_to_main_agent: OVERRIDE the default Shadcn radius in tailwind.config.js to '1rem' or '1.5rem'.
USE the 'ambient_main' image as a fixed background with low opacity (opacity-30) overlay for the entire app to give it texture.
DO NOT use solid white backgrounds for cards. Use the 'glassmorphism.heavy' class defined above.
For the Dashboard, use a Bento Grid layout. Do not just stack cards vertically.
The 'Coins' and 'Gamification' elements should use the 'accent' color (Amber/Gold) to stand out against the blue/violet theme.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast. If using glass backgrounds, ensure the text is Slate-900, not Slate-500.
Use 'Outfit' font for all headings. Import it from Google Fonts.
For the Video Player, switch to a 'Cinema Mode' (darker backdrop) to focus attention, but keep the UI controls glass-morphic.
universal_guidelines: Avoid 'AI Slop' - generic, centered, boring layouts.
Use 2-3x more padding than you think is necessary.
Every interaction must have a micro-animation (hover, click, focus).
